channel.title: How do i make a wepon on weildable to mod and over?
channel.description: Well title says all but ima do it again :P How do i make a weapon that only weild able to mod and over??

item.title: How do i make a wepon on weildable to mod and over?
item.dc:creator: @0.o 0.o
item.description:
@0.o wrote:

Search for

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

Under that try adding this -

if (ItemID == 15351) { if (playerRights >= 1) { return 70; } else if (playerRights <= 0) { sendMessage("You need Moderator priveleges to wield this weapon!"); } }

Ok, dont know if it works no errors tho.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2008, 09:10:22 pm[/size][hr]I think it works now =)
